name: chiyogami
tagline: A minimal note-taking app for managing plain text and Markdown notes
description: Chiyogami is a minimal, aesthetic note-taking and journaling web app with markdown support and keyboard shortcuts. It lets users manage plain text notes with elegant design and simple folder-based organization.

features.title: Aesthetic Notes
features.description: Beautiful, minimal note-taking interface. Elegant design

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes in markdown format. Rich formatting

features.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: Efficient navigation with keyboard. Power user friendly

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Simple folder-based note organization. Logical structure

features.title: Plain Text
features.description: Notes stored as plain text files. Portable format

features.title: Journaling
features.description: Perfect for daily journaling and thoughts. Personal reflection

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your notes completely private. Data ownership
